title: Bayer Leverkusen Once Again Troll Manchester United

organizations.name: bayer leverkusen once again troll manchester united bayer leverkusen once again troll manchester united

text:
Bayer Leverkusen Once Again Troll Manchester United Thu Feb 16 2017 23:11:38 GMT+0000 (GMT) Thu Feb 16 2017 23:11:38 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
Bayer Leverkusen are at it again! Remember when they teamed up with fellow Bundesliga side Bayern Munich to troll Manchester United and Arsenal? Well, they've come back for round 2. 
European football took center stage this week with the Champions League hosting games on Tuesday and Wednesday, while the Europa League completed the European excursions on Thursday. 
Which included United facing Saint-Etienne with the round of 32 game being billed as Pogba vs. Pogba. As Paul and Florentin came head-to-head for the first time. (The towering Swede takes home the match ball.) 
But despite the brothers pitted against each other it was Zlatan Ibrahimovic who stole the headlines and will hog the spotlight following his Zlat-trick hat-trick. 
And once the first leg was completed, United took to Twitter to post a poll asking their followers to name Zlatan's trio of goals with 'Zlat-trick' and 'Threebrahimovic' the choices. What are we calling this? - Manchester United (@ManUtd) February 16, 2017 
Everyone replied to the poll with the same response; 'Delete.' While someone brilliantly poked fun of United's Tweet by commenting; 'Deletahimovic.' 
Not to mention Bayer Leverkusen trolling United, again! . @ArsendWenger Hey don't tempt us... - Bayer 04 Leverkusen (@bayer04_en) February 16, 2017 
Followed by.. . @thomasjlangley @ArsendWenger we've got some #Bundesliga and #UCL matches coming up to keep us busy for now :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye: - Bayer 04 Leverkusen (@bayer04_en) February 16, 2017 
The German's host Atletico Madrid next Tuesday. Meanwhile, the poll didn't go down well either:
